text: What is English with Jennifer?
On YouTube English with Jennifer is a collection
of over 400 videos.
I have lessons for basic students
and lessons for more advanced learners.
All my videos are grouped into playlists.
Click on a playlist and you'll see the videos
in the order I uploaded them.
Grammar, vocabulary, writing, culture, and more.
Be sure to subscribe so you can learn
every time I upload a new video.
Teachers, please visit my WordPress blog
Many of my YouTube videos have links
to related posts on WordPress.
You'll find lots of teaching tips, classroom ideas,
and handouts you can download.
Students, please visit my website at www.englishwithjennifer.com.
There's a complete list of all my YouTube lessons.
If you're looking for more resources, I've got them.
Study tips, vocabulary videos, and listening practice
to help you understand fast speech.
If you're looking for more practice,
I have over 100 free interactive exercises.
Grammar, vocabulary, writing, culture...
Looking for more?
Then you need to click on Book a Lesson
to view my teaching schedule.
I have live group classes and self-paced courses.
